idea: We launch ourselves as EUMAN THERAPEUTICS PRIVATE LIMITED pioneers in providing therapies and consultation for various mental illness to its distinguished clients. We are looking for a best doctor’s for our patients that provide or give the best medical services to our patients in India. We have designed and built web-based and mobile app-based interventions that a doctor would prescribe/recommend for their patients/ caretakers. This clinically validated therapy-companion software would help patients better manage their health condition in collaboration with their provider. With a team of highly experienced specialists that source, assess and deliver as required, services get who they need on time and on budget. This enables us to deliver a high level of service to our patients. Globally, various randomized clinical trials have proven that software shows promise to address these challenges. ‘Software as drug’ is therefore the core-principle behind our startup. With a modest beginning needs, today is a well-established and leading organization offering medical services to mental illness with a wide range of services to the entire patients. Our Company is providing an app which offers a range of clinical tools and self-help psychological activities, topical content and webinars, bot-based check-ins and therapy sessions- All personalized as per the patients needs.
name: EUMAN THERAPEUTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
